document_data.name: Pan
document_data.mainbody: '''Pan''' was a settlement in the kingdom of [[Koryo]] in [[Kara-Tur]], lying on the shore of the [[Yellow Sea]] at the western end of the [[Vorkani Mountains]].
document_data.Organizations: Based in Pan was a [[yakuza]] family. Their symbol was a blue feather, which was tattooed on the heel of the left hand of their agents. They were allied with the notorious [[wu jen]] [[No Ziar]] the Mole.
document_data.History: In [[1357 DR]], a band of adventurers headed by [[Glei Yuindo]] returned to Pan and it was rumored they had discovered the famous lost fortress of [[Toranu Ganppo]]. However, before they could tell their story, they died of a mysterious sickness.
